p: The antioxidant activities of water, acetone, and methanol of cultivated and wild A. amatymbica were determined using 2,2â€²-azino-bis(3-ethylbenzthiazoline-6-sulphonic acid (ABTS), 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) radical scavenging activity, ferric reducing power, nitric oxide, and hydrogen peroxide inhibitory assays.
